description: This file defines a utility function 'add_item' for managing a shopping list within an agent context, including session state manipulation, logging, and retry logic. It also initializes an agent with specific configurations and demonstrates usage by adding an item.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and manages session state.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the shopping list in the agent's session state, raises RetryAgentRun if fewer than 3 items.
